mapper.sql: id, category_id, spu_id, spec_value_id, is_delete, create_date, update_date
mapper.select:
SELECT count(1) FROM tb_good_populate tgp join tb_goods_category category on tgp.category_id = category.id join tb_goods_spu spu on tgp.spu_id = spu.id join tb_goods_spec_value specValue on tgp.spec_value_id = specValue.id join tb_goods_spec spec on specValue.spec_id = spec.id where 1=1 and tgp.is_delete = 0 and spu.is_delete=0 and specValue.is_delete =0 and spec.is_delete =0 and category.is_delete = 0
and tgp.category_id = #{categoryId}
